forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later at night. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 9C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High near 55F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 43F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 59F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low near 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
